name: Jrimp 3: Jrimp 4
description:
It is recommended that you play Dawn of Jrimp before playing Jrimp 3: Jrimp 4.

The sequel, Jrimp 2: Life on the Streets, was nominated for 4 IGF awards. The game, due to its polarizing nature, did not secure an award at the Independent Games Festival. Jrimp 2 did, however, sweep awards at the Oscars, Golden Globes, and Emmy's.

"Jrimp changed my life. My only regret as a game developer is that I didn't think of Jrimp first." - Peter Molyneux
